sentences.en: A mottled red rash may appear on the skin.
sentences.cn: 皮肤上可能会出现一片斑驳的红疹.

sentences.en: A swath of moonlight in the long garden was mottled over with dark shadows.
sentences.cn: 长条的天井里露出一段月光,中间再涂上一些黑影.

sentences.en: Dark brown mottled inscriptions, Baked red border engraved gold.
sentences.cn: 暗褐色斑驳的碑文, 深烙上红金的边框.

sentences.en: Fernlike foliage and mottled wood used in cabinetry and veneering.
sentences.cn: 蕨类植物的叶子和斑驳的木头用于细木家具制作和镶木的过程中.

sentences.en: His face was mottled red and white with embarrassment.
sentences.cn: 他窘迫得脸上红一块白一块.

sentences.en: His face was mottled red and white.
sentences.cn: 他脸色变得红一块白一块的.

sentences.en: His red, mottled face showed the effect of too much whisky.
sentences.cn: 他那张红红的、满是斑点的脸表明，他威士忌喝得太多了。

sentences.en: In the mornings the sky appeared a heavy shade of mottled gray.
sentences.cn: 清晨，天空呈现出斑驳的深灰色。

sentences.en: Model 1 : Six ones are mottled belonging to printing and dyeing problem.
sentences.cn: 花型 1: 有6套床单搭色,属印染毛病.

sentences.en: Silence is a day and a beautiful mottled dream.
sentences.cn: 沉默的日子是一场一场艳丽而斑驳的梦.

sentences.en: The back of this snake is mottled.
sentences.cn: 这条蛇的背部有杂色斑点.

sentences.en: The male is grey with a dark brown head and mottled breast.
sentences.cn: 雄性身体为黑色,头深棕色,胸部有花纹.

sentences.en: The skin becomes mottled blue or purple, then red.
sentences.cn: 皮肤呈蓝或紫的斑点, 然后发红.

sentences.en: The soft, pine - filtered light caught her mottled russet coat.
sentences.cn: 柔和的月光透过松枝照在她那斑驳的赤褐色毛皮大衣上.

sentences.en: This painting of mottled bamboos is really true to life.
sentences.cn: 这幅湘竹画得十分逼真.

sentences.en: This two - stringed Chinese fiddle is made from mottled bamboo.
sentences.cn: “山”是个象形字,是由大山的形态演化而来的.

words.tran_cn: 使呈杂色；使显得斑驳陆离

trans.tran_en: covered with spots or coloured areas

trans.tran_cn: 使成杂色，使有斑点( mottle的过去式和过去分词 )
